author: Special Correspondent
text:
Eight fishermen of Akkaraipettai were reportedly arrested by Sri Lankan Navy on Monday for crossing the IMBL and poaching in Lankan waters.

According to sources, the fishermen, K. Anandan (50), G. Ranganathan (29), K. Lakshmanan (40), N. Kannan (27), S. Vinodh (28), T. Chithravel (28), P. Balamurugan (35) and K. Saminathan (25), had ventured into the sea on Sunday and were scheduled to return home on Monday.

The arrested fishermen were taken to Mullaitheevu for interrogation, the sources said.
title: 8 fishermen arrested
